Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The lifetime risk of breast cancer appears similar to the risk in BRCA1 carriers , but there was some suggestion of a lower risk in BRCA2 carriers < 50 years of age .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease          |
|------------------|
| Breast cancer     |
| BRCA1-related cancer (implied) |
| BRCA2-related cancer (implied) |
